html:
7.18.17  5:37 am   you seem to enjoy answering music theory-related questions. is that so?

     not really. most of the time i find myself trying to explain to people over and over that they need to rely on their ears / spirits, if they want to find the 'right' answers in music
7.18.17  2:06 am   why do you what you do?

7.18.17  1:58 am   If nothing is boring, is everything the same?

     no

7.18.17  1:04 am   Every time when I look for the latest news online the world seems to be burning in hell.

     that's because it's their job to go out and find the worst stuff. it increases their views if the stories they find seem terrible

7.18.17  12:43 am   Do you know any useful tips in order for me to improve my singing and the range I have? 

     sing more

7.18.17  12:19 am   Do you like water?

     oh hell yeah

7.17.17  10:59 pm   what is your favourite video game? please bill don't say that you like the qualities of each one. it might be true, but i'm asking an overall appreciation. of course i will respect whatever answer you give me
7.17.17  10:04 pm   hey bill, i'm trying to figure out how i can be more Creative. can you give any advice on that?

7.17.17  9:49 pm   so what took you so long to get onto the internet and post stuff for the first time?

     my question is, what took You so long
7.17.17  8:01 pm   You're a talented man, do you have any formal training in music theory at all?

7.17.17  7:50 pm   what do you think goats think about?

     other goats, i suppose

7.17.17  7:32 pm   you gonna make more stuff?

     i have never stopped and i'm not going to stop. i wonder when people will ever realize this

7.17.17  6:46 pm   you can mathematically prove that all numbers are interesting.

     darn right you can

     let's first assume that there are some numbers that are not interesting. now if you look at the smallest uninteresting number, it actually has the interesting property of being a smallest uninteresting number, which is a contradiction, and therefore no uninteresting numbers can exist. cool, huh?

     can i hire you to explain to everyone why i can't answer questions about what my favorite anything is

7.17.17  6:21 pm   i get this issue as a newbie content creator, that i'm never completely happy of the stuff i put out. ia this something that you experience too?
do you have advices on this?

     you just have to do more

7.17.17  6:15 pm   Is IQ really definitive of all that a person is capable of?

     it mainly represents how you decided to answer the questions on the test

7.17.17  4:36 pm   I saw in the questions panel that you had a random question generator. Why isn't there a link for it on your website?

     because i haven't found a good place to put it yet
7.17.17  4:27 pm   hi bill if you could avoid being asked a question on this page (or several, whatever) which would it/they be?

7.17.17  4:23 pm   Reply to 7.16.17  3:22 pm   "Reply to 7.15.17  12:15 am: why don't you upload the 4 songs to youtube? is it because there is no visuals or something else?" Couldn't you just make a separate YouTube channel for this content? That way it won't effect your current YouTube channel.

     the good news is i have people constantly pressuring me to put songs on youtube. which helps me think clearly

7.17.17  4:04 pm   you should try being unreasonable. that's a good trick!

     that sounds reasonable to me

7.17.17  3:46 pm   i often see you answer only one part of the question, usually the last one.

     i usually answer both, putting the answer in between the parts, like this

     can you explain?

     i think people usually have a tendency to assume that whatever i did most recently is what i 'usually' do, regardless if i do it another way the majority of the time

7.17.17  3:39 pm   Have you noticed that Csus4 can also be Fsus2?

     yes, the bass player gets to choose which one it is

7.17.17  3:27 pm   today i learned how awesome an add9 chord is, do you ever use it?

     yes

7.17.17  3:04 pm   Do you has a instagram

     yes

7.17.17  2:31 pm   why do your songs sound the same

     i think they sound different, but i respect your opinion

7.17.17  2:17 pm   what qualities will you be looking for in members of the bill wurtz band?

     really good, experienced, professional players

7.17.17  1:06 pm   Thoughts on lying? (not telling the truth, etc)

     that's the oldest trick in the book

7.17.17  12:38 pm   Did u make this website yourself, or did u pay for someone.
If this was paid for they didn't do a good job

     i think it's great, but i respect your opinion

7.17.17  12:07 pm   i have always loved your speech to chords videos, have you thought about making more??

     oh hell yeah

7.17.17  8:32 am   Hey, I see you always create a separate page for questions that are asked again and again (pets questions, for example), but why you don't with the "Why do you make weird videos" question? You always answer individually "i'm just trying to be reasonable" instead.

     i actually just realized i do have a page for that

7.17.17  7:31 am   It appears that the verses and the chorus in the song "movie star" have nothing to do with one another. Did you mean to do that?

     i tried to make the song sound good and feel meaningful, all together. i'm not sure if that answers your question

7.17.17  5:54 am   Why is the "RANDOM QUESTION" button so detailed? It is not natural, bill, I am concerned.

     i think each browser displays it differently. that might be the way your browser displays buttons. on mine it looks very simple

7.17.17  2:14 am   How to be yourself?

     it is the default setting. although sometimes you have to go in and make sure no one is messing with the settings

7.17.17  2:03 am   Do you hate C#maj chords?

     no, although usually when it's major i call it Db major

7.17.17  1:52 am   hey man love your website. do you have a youtube channel or something like that?

     yes

7.17.17  1:45 am   Where you surprised when "A history of the entire world... I guess" blew the fuck up and went viral?

     no

7.17.17  1:02 am   what is your opinion on croissants?

     it's bread, deluxe

7.17.17  12:27 am   Regarding the 7.16.17  8:02 pm   question... "Why do we need a 'back to questions page' when we already have a 'go back one page' button????? are we dumb????".... Um... is there a "go back to page button here" on here somewhere? Where is it?

     i think it's built into your web browser

7.16.17  10:21 pm   when do you know if you're insane

     you'll just have to decide for yourself

7.16.17  8:02 pm   Why do we need a 'back to questions page' when we already have a 'go back one page' button????? are we dumb????

     some people actually wish that i had More special back links (such as back to the home page from here, etc). some people (like you) wish there were less of them. as a compromise, i have decided to use a medium amount of special back links. i hope that makes sense

7.16.17  7:06 pm   Do you post some of your notebook entries on your twitter

     yes, and also most of the notebook items from 2014 and later were written for twitter

7.16.17  5:46 pm   Create... new content. Stop... having it be not created.

     i have been creating content non stop since early 2014. actually since way before then. but i respect your opinion

7.16.17  5:23 pm   hi! thoughts on bras?

     it's french arms

7.16.17  4:33 pm   Do you make a living out of this? How can I support you? :)

     click here

7.16.17  4:33 pm   Is it a bad idea to come up with a song title and write the song around it?

     no. it is an interesting strategy, although not the only strategy

7.16.17  4:29 pm   Do you need a backup singer?

     i need 2 or 3

7.16.17  4:25 pm   Hi Bill. I want to write a story. Some advice?

     try writing a story!
7.16.17  3:22 pm   Reply to 7.15.17  12:15 am: why don't you upload the 4 songs to youtube? is it because there is no visuals or something else?

7.16.17  2:17 pm   What does "LTR" mean? I saw it on some of the filenames when I downloaded your jazz covers a while back and I never figured it out. Like, ltr-i-remember-clifford. What does it mean?

     'learning to read' but i realized later it also can mean 'left to right'

7.16.17  1:09 pm   be my sister

     i will try
7.16.17  1:00 pm   Why man why.Just why i dont want any excuses just give me the answer,WHY Why BUTT WHY.
